# hrui_vlan_vid (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `accept_frame_type` (String) Accepted frame type: 'All', 'Tagged', or 'Untagged'.
- `port` (Number) Port number.
- `vlan_id` (Number) VLAN ID to assign to the port.
